about_the_game:
This world is very different from our own...A recent event known as The Shattering has fractured the timeline, forcing twelve islands from different time periods and regions to come together! The ancient religion of Eternum created devices called Projectors long ago, they're powered by a strange substance called Flux. They were meant to capture their souls and send them to the peaceful afterlife. But it didn't work...leaving their spirits trapped inside of the projectors for people who call themselves The Bonded to find.

Challenge authority, rewrite reality itself, and reshape the world of Aeonrealm with your law bending abilities! Isle of Echoes is a new game with hours of interesting interactions and experiences while uncovering the mystery of the ghostly beings known as echoes.

Isle of Echoes is an immersive RPG game where you use the abilities of your echoes to bring peace (or chaos) to the land of Aeonrealm! When the player wakes up in Aeonrealm, they can't remember what brought them there or their goal. Through their journey to find out, they find the struggles of the Aeonites, hopefully they'll make the right choices.

Echoes are the spirits of the ancient followers of Eternum that were trapped inside their projectors. When a bonded has freed an echo from its projector and well...bonded with it. The echo will be grateful and offer assistance with their adventures. Each having a unique personality, design, backstory, and abilities. Which can range from controlling the direction of gravity to...gambling?

The Regions
  • Badlands: Antarctic Ocean (South of Australia) 2044
  • Wastelands: Post-Apocalyptic State of Amapá Brazil 2041
  • Atlantis: Underwater Kochi, India 2036
  • D.C. District: Washington D.C. 2031
  • Amowari: Antarctic Research town 2033
  • Badamjeon: Flux-Powered South Korean Town 2003
  • Volgograd: Post-War Russian Town 1953
  • Gearheart: Steampunk Frontier New York City 1890
  • Dublin: Noir Dublin Ireland 1834
  • Shì Jiǎo: Chinese Market Island 1806
  • Æresbjerg: Fantasy Denmark City 1431
  • Monen: Eternum's Land ???

content_descriptors.notes: Some NPC voicelines contain swears and vulgar language. Some use of alchohol may be witnissed by players.

name: Isle of Echoes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Violência fantasiosa

reviews:
“The game is very cool and has lots of passion behind it!”
OverYoutube
short_description: Challenge authority, rewrite reality itself, and reshape the world around you with your law bending abilities! Isle of Echoes is a new game for VR and screen players, with hours of interesting interactions and experiences while uncovering the mystery of Aeonrealm.
